text: ‘‘ninu nanage adesisiruvudara horatu berenannu nanu avarige helilla. – Nanna odeyanu nim'ma odeyanu agiruva allahananne aradhisiri (endaste nanu helidde). Nanu avara naduve iddastu kala avara visayadalli nane saksiyagidde. Taruvaya ninu nannannu melettikonda balika nine avara melvicarakanagidde. Ninantu pratiyondu visayakku saksiyagiruve’’
